subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Morgan Pressel has a two-shot advantage in the L.P.G.A. Championship, with the world’s No. 1 player, Inbee Park, and Chella Choi on her heels heading into the 36-hole finish Sunday.
snippet: Morgan Pressel has a two-shot advantage in the L.P.G.A. Championship, with the world’s No. 1 player, Inbee Park, and Chella Choi on her heels heading into the 36-hole finish Sunday.
